familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former director/president of Trump Marks Panama Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
Former president/member of Trump Marks Panama LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company holds a license deal with K Group Developers Inc.

conflictDescription: TEST DESCRIPTION FOR THE CONFLICT (Friendly Name): Trump Marks Panama
